text:
炳胜饮食集团旗下拥有炳胜品味、炳胜私厨、炳胜公馆、炳胜禅意、小炳胜五大系列品牌，共17家分店，受到广大顾客追捧，月均客流量高达40.3万人次。
炳胜公馆、炳胜品味获“国家五钻级酒家”殊荣
2018-2024连续七年炳胜公馆（珠江新城店）、炳胜私厨（天河东店）荣获广州米其林一星
炳胜 · 禅意茶素、炳胜品味（海印总店）荣获广州米其林指南入选餐厅
trans:
Bing Sheng Catering Group encompasses five brands: Bingsheng Taste, Bingsheng Private Kitchen, Bingsheng Mansion, Bingsheng Zen, and Little Bingsheng, with a total of 17 locations. These outlets are highly popular among customers, attracting an average monthly foot traffic of 403,000.
Bingsheng Public House and Bingsheng Taste have earned the prestigious title of "National Five-Diamond Restaurant."
From 2018 to 2024, Bing sheng Mansion (Zhujiang New Town) and Bingsheng Private Kitchen (Tianhe East) have been awarded a Michelin one-star rating in Guangzhou for seven consecutive years.
Bingsheng Zen Tea Vegetarian and Bingsheng Taste (Haiyin Main Store) have also been recognized in the Michelin Guide Guangzhou.
